languages.text: "Неравнодушн{mf|ый|ая} граждан{mf|ин|ка}. С оружием. Хорошо подумайте, хотите ли вы мне грубить".
"A concerned citizen. An armed one. I suggest you think well before giving me lip."
languages.original_text: "Неравнодушн{mf|ый|ая} граждан{mf|ин|ка}. С оружием. Хорошо подумайте, хотите ли вы мне грубить".

traits.locale_text: "A concerned citizen. An armed one. I suggest you think well before giving me lip."
"A concerned citizen. An armed one. I suggest you think well before giving me lip."
"A concerned citizen. An armed one. I suggest you think well before giving me lip."
"A concerned citizen. An armed one. I suggest you think well before giving me lip."
"A concerned citizen. An armed one. I suggest you think well before giving me lip."

languages.text: 「心配をしている一市民だ。断っておくが、武装している。何か言うつもりなら、よく考えてから発言した方がいい」
languages.original_text: "A concerned citizen. An armed one. I suggest you think well before giving me lip."

traits.locale_text: 「心配をしている一市民だ。断っておくが、武装している。何か言うつもりなら、よく考えてから発言した方がいい」

languages.text: “我是一位热心公民，而且是位全副武装的公民。我建议你三思而后行。”
languages.original_text: "A concerned citizen. An armed one. I suggest you think well before giving me lip."

traits.locale_text: “我是一位热心公民，而且是位全副武装的公民。我建议你三思而后行。”

languages.text: «{mf|Un ciudadano preocupado. Y uno armado.|Una ciudadana preocupada. Y una armada.} Le recomiendo que se lo piense dos veces antes de soltar cualquier chorrada».
languages.original_text: "A concerned citizen. An armed one. I suggest you think well before giving me lip."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Un ciudadano preocupado. Y uno armado.|Una ciudadana preocupada. Y una armada.} Le recomiendo que se lo piense dos veces antes de soltar cualquier chorrada».

languages.text: « {mf|Un citoyen préoccupé|Une citoyenne préoccupée} et bien {mf|armé|armée}. Je vous suggère de réfléchir une seconde avant de faire preuve d'insolence. »
languages.original_text: "A concerned citizen. An armed one. I suggest you think well before giving me lip."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Un citoyen préoccupé|Une citoyenne préoccupée} et bien {mf|armé|armée}. Je vous suggère de réfléchir une seconde avant de faire preuve d'insolence. »

languages.text: "Ein beunruhigter Bürger. Noch dazu bewaffnet. Ihr solltet gründlich nachdenken, bevor Ihr pampig werdet."
languages.original_text: "A concerned citizen. An armed one. I suggest you think well before giving me lip."

traits.locale_text: "Ein beunruhigter Bürger. Noch dazu bewaffnet. Ihr solltet gründlich nachdenken, bevor Ihr pampig werdet."

languages.text: "Duyarlı bir yurttaşım. Hem de silahlı. Benimle ileri geri konuşmadan önce iki kere düşünmeni öneririm."
languages.original_text: "A concerned citizen. An armed one. I suggest you think well before giving me lip."

traits.locale_text: "Sıradan bir vatandaş. Silahlı olanından. Benimle ileri geri konuşmadan önce iki kere düşünmeni tavsiye ederim."
